WRITING.TEXT: Btw, it's a pullthrough earring, so they didn't/couldn't hurt themselves or me. They like to play with it because they can never seem to catch it, which becomes a new mission for them (birb dedication), so they were working together to get my earring.
Ah my birds do this all the time too! They see my glass of water always as a bath. They even sometimes fight about my glass of water who takes the first "dive".... birds being birds
